html: Today's #EqualityAct hearing is wrapping up with a statement from @RepBonamici. "All Americans should have full confidence in their rights regardless of who they love or who they are."
text: Today's #EqualityAct hearing is wrapping up with a statement from @RepBonamici. "All Americans should have full confidence in their rights regardless of who they love or who they are."

html: To all the LGBTQ and gender nonconforming people who are following today's hearing, know that we see you and hear you. I strongly encourage my colleagues to support the #EqualityAct.
text: To all the LGBTQ and gender nonconforming people who are following today's hearing, know that we see you and hear you. I strongly encourage my colleagues to support the #EqualityAct.

html: We cannot ignore stories like Kai’s, or pretend that they are isolated incidents. We cannot accept the status quo, in which an individual’s basic civil rights are recognized in one state, but then potentially cease to exist when they cross state lines. #EqualityAcpic.twitter.com/Hx6U6E8BOv
text: We cannot ignore stories like Kai’s, or pretend that they are isolated incidents. We cannot accept the status quo, in which an individual’s basic civil rights are recognized in one state, but then potentially cease to exist when they cross state lines. #EqualityAcpic.twitter.com/Hx6U6E8BOv

html: These four bipartisan bills demonstrate clear support for expanding federal research on ocean & coastal acidification. Our oceans & estuaries are very vulnerable to the climate change. We cannot afford to wait. I look forward to @HouseScience moving these bills to the House Floor
text: These four bipartisan bills demonstrate clear support for expanding federal research on ocean & coastal acidification. Our oceans & estuaries are very vulnerable to the climate change. We cannot afford to wait. I look forward to @HouseScience moving these bills to the House Floor

html: I joined my Congressional Estuary Caucus Co-Chair @congbillposey in introducing the NEAR Act, which would address the urgent need for research on ocean and coastal acidification in estuaries.
text: I joined my Congressional Estuary Caucus Co-Chair @congbillposey in introducing the NEAR Act, which would address the urgent need for research on ocean and coastal acidification in estuaries.

html: I co-led @RepDerekKilmer's Ocean Acidification Innovation Act, which would address persistent funding gaps in ocean acidification research, encourage collaboration, & spur innovative strategies to mitigate and adapt to changes in ocean chemistry through a prize competition.
text: I co-led @RepDerekKilmer's Ocean Acidification Innovation Act, which would address persistent funding gaps in ocean acidification research, encourage collaboration, & spur innovative strategies to mitigate and adapt to changes in ocean chemistry through a prize competition.

html: I am also proud to be an original cosponsor of @chelliepingree's Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act, which would improve our understanding of the socioeconomic effects and vulnerabilities of ocean acidification.
text: I am also proud to be an original cosponsor of @chelliepingree's Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act, which would improve our understanding of the socioeconomic effects and vulnerabilities of ocean acidification.

html: Changes in ocean chemistry endanger shellfish, salmon, and other finfish & threaten the blue economy, including fisheries that depend on the oceans’ resources to support their families, & Tribes with deep cultural and historical connections to diminishing species.
text: Changes in ocean chemistry endanger shellfish, salmon, and other finfish & threaten the blue economy, including fisheries that depend on the oceans’ resources to support their families, & Tribes with deep cultural and historical connections to diminishing species.

html: I introduced the #COASTResearchAct with @repdonyoung, @chelliepingree, & @congbillposey to expand scientific research & monitoring to improve our understanding of ocean & coastal acidification and inform vulnerable communities and industries on how to prepare and adapt.
text: I introduced the #COASTResearchAct with @repdonyoung, @chelliepingree, & @congbillposey to expand scientific research & monitoring to improve our understanding of ocean & coastal acidification and inform vulnerable communities and industries on how to prepare and adapt.

html: The #PaycheckFairnessAct would help to address the pay gap by closing loopholes in current law and providing workers with the tools they need to achieve equal pay for equal work. I encourage my colleagues in the Senate to take up this legislation quickly.
text: The #PaycheckFairnessAct would help to address the pay gap by closing loopholes in current law and providing workers with the tools they need to achieve equal pay for equal work. I encourage my colleagues in the Senate to take up this legislation quickly.

html: Even in 2019, equal pay for equal work is still not always a reality. Last month, I was honored to Chair the @EdLaborCmte hearing on the barriers to detecting wage discrimination and holding employers accountable.

Even in 2019, equal pay for equal work is still not always a reality.
Last month, I was honored to Chair the @EdLaborCmte hearing on the barriers to detecting wage discrimination and holding employers accountable.

html: The Obama Administration issued a stronger rule in 2016 to update the income threshold and guarantee updates every three years. According to the DOL's own estimates, the new proposal from the Trump Administration would cover fewer workers.
text: The Obama Administration issued a stronger rule in 2016 to update the income threshold and guarantee updates every three years. According to the DOL's own estimates, the new proposal from the Trump Administration would cover fewer workers.

html: The overtime salary threshold is a fundamental tool to make sure that workers are paid fairly for their work. Unfortunately, it has not kept pace with inflation and the needs of working families.

html: I call on the U.S. Department of Education to protect and promote the civil rights of all students, and promptly enforce the Equity in Individuals with Disabilities Education Act regulation.
text: I call on the U.S. Department of Education to protect and promote the civil rights of all students, and promptly enforce the Equity in Individuals with Disabilities Education Act regulation.

html: The regulation requires states to identify & address when students of color are inappropriately identified for special education. A 2013 GAO study found that only about 2% of school districts were taking action despite pervasive & persistent disparities. https://www.gao.gov/assets/660/652437.pdf …
text: The regulation requires states to identify & address when students of color are inappropriately identified for special education. A 2013 GAO study found that only about 2% of school districts were taking action despite pervasive & persistent disparities. https://www.gao.gov/assets/660/652437.pdf …

html: The disproportionate representation of children of color in special education contributes to segregation in our ed system & perpetuates the school-to-prison pipeline. Children with disabilities, particularly African American students, are suspended & expelled at higher rates.
text: The disproportionate representation of children of color in special education contributes to segregation in our ed system & perpetuates the school-to-prison pipeline. Children with disabilities, particularly African American students, are suspended & expelled at higher rates.

html: I wrote a letter to Secretary DeVos last year to explain problems with the Department of Education’s decision to delay this important rule, which addresses widespread disparities between white students and students of color with disabilities.https://bonamici.house.gov/media/press-releases/bonamici-stands-students-color-equity-education …

html: Protecting public lands reflects our state's best values – environmental protection, stewardship of our land, & community partnership. I will continue to fight to protect our nation’s natural resources so our public lands may be enjoyed and preserved for future generations.
text: Protecting public lands reflects our state's best values – environmental protection, stewardship of our land, & community partnership. I will continue to fight to protect our nation’s natural resources so our public lands may be enjoyed and preserved for future generations.

html: The package includes several provisions from @RonWyden's Oregon Wildlands Act. It would create the Devil’s Staircase Wilderness, and protect the Chetco River, Rogue River, Molalla River, Jenny Creek, Wasson Creek, Franklin Creek, and Elk River.
text: The package includes several provisions from @RonWyden's Oregon Wildlands Act. It would create the Devil’s Staircase Wilderness, and protect the Chetco River, Rogue River, Molalla River, Jenny Creek, Wasson Creek, Franklin Creek, and Elk River.

html: Today the House passed a broad public lands package with my support. The bill will permanently reauthorize the Land and Water Conservation Fund. #LWCF makes it possible for us all to enjoy the precious outdoor areas that make Oregon so special.
text: Today the House passed a broad public lands package with my support. The bill will permanently reauthorize the Land and Water Conservation Fund. #LWCF makes it possible for us all to enjoy the precious outdoor areas that make Oregon so special.

html: Oregonians know that protecting our #PublicLands, national parks, forests, scenic areas, and wildlife refuges, means protecting the natural beauty and recreation our communities enjoy and the robust habitats fish and wildlife depend on for survival.

html: I urge my colleagues to join me in rejecting the President’s abuse of power.
text: I urge my colleagues to join me in rejecting the President’s abuse of power.

html: Building this wall is not a good investment and it will not stop crime or illegal immigration along our southern border. Instead of building walls, we should instead build bridges to those who are fleeing violence and legally seeking asylum in our country.
text: Building this wall is not a good investment and it will not stop crime or illegal immigration along our southern border. Instead of building walls, we should instead build bridges to those who are fleeing violence and legally seeking asylum in our country.

html: I support taking action to make sure we have the appropriate personnel, equipment, facilities, and resources to protect our borders from criminal activity like trafficking in drugs or people.
text: I support taking action to make sure we have the appropriate personnel, equipment, facilities, and resources to protect our borders from criminal activity like trafficking in drugs or people.

html: This declaration is an unacceptable abuse of power that circumvents the constitutional authority of Congress.

html: The President is using this declaration as a false pretense to divert taxpayer money, primarily away from the Department of Defense, toward the construction of a wasteful, ineffective wall along the southern border.

html: I will work with my colleagues on @HouseScience & on the Select Committee on the Climate Crisis to continue to highlight the consequences of climate change, the risks of inaction, and potential adaptation strategies. It's time for bold proposals to #ActOnClimate.
text: I will work with my colleagues on @HouseScience & on the Select Committee on the Climate Crisis to continue to highlight the consequences of climate change, the risks of inaction, and potential adaptation strategies. It's time for bold proposals to #ActOnClimate.

html: Climate change affects our entire economy and is inextricably linked with the need to create good-paying jobs. We must strengthen investments in resilient infrastructure to prepare for rising sea levels and avoid catastrophic damage from climate change.
text: Climate change affects our entire economy and is inextricably linked with the need to create good-paying jobs. We must strengthen investments in resilient infrastructure to prepare for rising sea levels and avoid catastrophic damage from climate change.

html: Children, older adults, low-income individuals, and communities of color are disproportionately affected by climate change. We must do more to mitigate the consequences of climate change for vulnerable populations.
text: Children, older adults, low-income individuals, and communities of color are disproportionately affected by climate change. We must do more to mitigate the consequences of climate change for vulnerable populations.

html: At a time when the world is facing record heat waves and droughts, more acidic oceans, rising sea levels, and a surge in other extreme weather patterns, we must fight for comprehensive policies to protect the health of our planet. #ActOnClimate
text: At a time when the world is facing record heat waves and droughts, more acidic oceans, rising sea levels, and a surge in other extreme weather patterns, we must fight for comprehensive policies to protect the health of our planet. #ActOnClimate

html: We have the opportunity to disrupt a national cycle of discriminatory pay that keeps too many women and families in poverty. We can finally make equal pay for equal work a reality by passing the #PaycheckFairness Act.
text: We have the opportunity to disrupt a national cycle of discriminatory pay that keeps too many women and families in poverty. We can finally make equal pay for equal work a reality by passing the #PaycheckFairness Act.

html: Several states, including Oregon, have acted to address pay inequities, but it is time for Congress to address persistent wage discrimination nationwide.
text: Several states, including Oregon, have acted to address pay inequities, but it is time for Congress to address persistent wage discrimination nationwide.

html: The lack of easily accessible data on wages makes discrimination difficult to detect, let alone prevent. Even when wage discrimination is discovered, working women still face significant barriers to meet the heavy burden of proof for holding employers accountable.
text: The lack of easily accessible data on wages makes discrimination difficult to detect, let alone prevent. Even when wage discrimination is discovered, working women still face significant barriers to meet the heavy burden of proof for holding employers accountable.

html: The Equal Pay Act has been law for more than a half century, but in 2019 #EqualPayForEqualWork is not always a reality. Across the country, far too many women are still being paid less than men for doing the same work.
text: The Equal Pay Act has been law for more than a half century, but in 2019 #EqualPayForEqualWork is not always a reality. Across the country, far too many women are still being paid less than men for doing the same work.

html: In 1963, Pres. Kennedy signed the #EqualPay Act and our country enshrined into law a fundamental concept: equal pay for equal work, regardless of sex. We have made progress, but unfortunately loopholes and insufficient enforcement have allowed wage discrimination to persist.https://twitter.com/EdLaborCmte/status/1095702146803224577 …
text: In 1963, Pres. Kennedy signed the #EqualPay Act and our country enshrined into law a fundamental concept: equal pay for equal work, regardless of sex. html: The most recent increase to the federal minimum wage in 2007 failed to address inflation rates, driving persistent income inequality. Congress must act. The #RaiseTheWage Act is good for workers and good for the economy.
text: The most recent increase to the federal minimum wage in 2007 failed to address inflation rates, driving persistent income inequality. Congress must act. The #RaiseTheWage Act is good for workers and good for the economy.

html: The origins of a tipped minimum wage are deeply intertwined with the history of slavery in the US. Oregon is one of seven states that prohibit employers from paying tipped workers a subminimum wage. The #RaiseTheWage Act will gradually phase it out at the federal level.
text: The origins of a tipped minimum wage are deeply intertwined with the history of slavery in the US. Oregon is one of seven states that prohibit employers from paying tipped workers a subminimum wage. The #RaiseTheWage Act will gradually phase it out at the federal level.

html: The majority of workers earning a minimum wage are women and people of color. The #RaiseTheWage Act will address these persistent wage gaps and allow workers to afford the “bare necessities of life” as intended by the Fair Labor Standards Act.
text: The majority of workers earning a minimum wage are women and people of color. The #RaiseTheWage Act will address these persistent wage gaps and allow workers to afford the “bare necessities of life” as intended by the Fair Labor Standards Act.

html: When workers are paid wages that leave them in poverty, they struggle to pay for rising rent, essentials like food & transportation, and child care. In Washington County, a worker making the local min wage would have to work 73 hrs/wk to afford a one-bedroom apartment.

html: Ten years after Pres. Obama signed the @Lilly_Ledbetter #FairPay Act into law & nearly 56 years after the #EqualPay Act, I'm proud to join @rosadelauro in introducing the #PaycheckFairness Act to eliminate pay discrimination, close the wage gap, and help women achieve equal pay.

text:
Raising the Minimum Wage: 
A Five-Part Story
1. Democrats propose raising the minimum wage
2. Opponents say it will cost jobs and destroy the economy

4. It does not cost jobs or kill the economy

If this shutdown continues, James will miss his pension check at the end of the month. But like many Coast Guard members I’ve heard from, he’s not worried about himself: he’s worried about the young families who will be most hurt by missing a paycheck. 

#ShutdownStories

html: I’ve been on the Intelligence Committee for over 10 years. On terrorism and other threats, I’ve received more briefings from FBI, CIA, and DHS than I could count. How many times have any of them said we need a wall across the southern border? Zero.

I’ve been on the Intelligence Committee for over 10 years. On terrorism and other threats, I’ve received more briefings from FBI, CIA, and DHS than I could count.

How many times have any of them said we need a wall across the southern border?

Zero.

html: Forests offset approx 11% of U.S. CO2 emissions between 1990-2015, but without intervention that capability will decline. Because of aging forests and increased land use, forests are projected to store less carbon (35% less than 2013 levels by 2037). #NCA4 #ClimateCrisisCountdown

html: The effect of humans on the Earth’s climate is unprecedented. Since the start of the industrial era, our dependency on fossil fuels, widespread deforestation, and other carbon-producing activities have caused and continue to cause irreparable damage. #NCA4 #ClimateCrisisCountdown

html: It is very likely that the Arctic will be nearly free of sea ice in late summer by mid-century. As permafrost continues to thaw, the CO2 and methane released has the potential to amplify human-induced warming. #NCA4 #ClimateCrisisCountdown

html: The sea level is very likely to rise 1 to 4 feet by the end of the century, devastating many coastal communities. The frequency, depth, and extent of tidal flooding are expected to continue to increase in the future with coastal storms. #NCA4 #ClimateCrisisCountdown

html: Our oceans are warming and becoming more acidic. They have absorbed 93% of the heat from warming caused by human activities since the mid-20th century and are absorbing more than a quarter of the CO2 emitted to the atmosphere annually #NCA4 #ClimateCrisisCountdown

html: I am excited to see many new members of the U.S. House and many Oregonians reaffirm the urgency and commitment to bold action to protect our environment.
text: I am excited to see many new members of the U.S. House and many Oregonians reaffirm the urgency and commitment to bold action to protect our environment.

html: And importantly, the movement recognizes that our most vulnerable communities must be part of the conversation and involved in the solution.
text: And importantly, the movement recognizes that our most vulnerable communities must be part of the conversation and involved in the solution.

html: Climate change affects our community, our economy, and our planet. The #GreenNewDeal recognizes the importance of all stakeholders working together on the wide and diverse set of issues we face in addressing climate change.

html: Last month I joined a bipartisan group of colleagues in calling on Trump to launch an investigation to determine whether sanctions should be imposed under the Global Magnitsky Human Rights Accountability Act. The U.S. can and must be a leader in diplomacy and human rights.
